content: 1st-dr3tog over the first 3 sts of next petal dr in the next 4 sts 2nd-dr3tog ch5 3 times e breakaway to next flower f repeat from step 2a until a total of 10 flowers have been started on this row return row 3 for the current and the next 8 flowers a wedge in next ch2 space ch5 1st-dr3tog over the first 3 sts of next petal dr in the next 4 sts 2nd-dr3tog ch5 twice b wedge in next ch2 space ch2 slip_stitch into next ch5 space ch2 continue to next flower c repeat from step 3a 8 more times 4 for the last flower a wedge in next ch2 space ch5 b 1st-dr3tog over the first 3 sts of next petal dr in the next 4 sts 2nd-dr3tog ch5 2nd row of flower motifs joined foundation row 5 first flower a wfrs b first petal restoredr3tog dr in the next 4 sts 2nd-dr3tog over the next 3 sts ch2 skip 2 petals behind hook slip_stitch into next ch5 space ch2 c wedge in next ch2 space ch2 skip 3 wedges behind hook slip_stitch in next ch5 space ch2 6 d second petal 1st-dr3tog over the first 3 sts of next petal dr in the next 4 sts 2nd-dr3tog over next 3 sts ch2 skip 2 petals behind hook slip_stitch into ch5 space ch2 e wedge in next ch2 space ch5 f third petal 1st-dr3tog over the first 3 sts of next petal dr in the next 4 sts 2nd-dr3tog ch5 g breakaway to next flower 6 for the next 8 flowers a wfrs b first petal restoredr3tog dr in the next 4 sts 2nd-dr3tog over the next 3 sts ch2 skip 2 petals behind hook slip_stitch into next ch5 space ch2 c wedge in next ch2 space ch2 skip 3 wedges behind hook slip_stitch in next ch5 space ch2 d next petal 1st-dr3tog over the first 3 sts of next petal dr in the next 4 sts 2nd-dr3tog over next 3 sts ch2 e skip 2 petals behind hook slip_stitch into ch5 space ch2 repeat once more from step 6c f wedge in next ch2 space ch5 g fourth petal 1st-dr3tog over the first 3 sts of next petal dr in the next 4 sts 2nd-dr3tog ch5 h breakaway to next flower i repeat from step 6a until a total of 9 flowers have been started on this row return row 7 for the current and next 7 flowers a wedge in next ch2 space ch5 1st-dr3tog over the first 3 sts of next petal dr in the next 4 sts 2nd-dr3tog ch5 twice b wedge in next ch2 space ch2 slip_stitch into next ch5 space ch2 continue to next flower c repeat from step 7a 7 more times 8 for the last flower a wedge in next ch2 space ch5 b 1st-dr3tog over the first 3 sts of next petal dr in the next 4 sts 2nd-dr3tog ch5 3rd row of flower motifs joined foundation row
